channel.title: Publications on Moo! - Michiel van der Meer
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Moo! - Michiel van der Meer

item.title: HyEnA: A Hybrid Method for Extracting Arguments from Opinions
item.description: My work on extracting arguments from an opinion corpus using a hybrid (human + AI) approach. Link to the paper: TBD. Supplementary material Description and additional results Code and data Annotator instructions - consent form - argument annotation - argument consolidation - evaluation - (expert) topic generation - topic assignment Screenshots - signup page (consent form) - main page - argument annotation - argument consolidation - evaluation - topic assignment How to cite @misc{van2022hyenasuppl author={van der Meer, Michiel and Liscio, Enrico and Jonker, Catholijn M and Plaat, Aske and Vossen, Piek and Murukannaiah, Pradeep K}, title={HyEnA: A Hybrid Method for Extracting Arguments from Opinions: Supplementary Material}, howpublished={https://liacs.
